name: Lost Hearth (Formica_dev)
description:
My long ago abandoned game. Still love it, though. I hope i will have opportunity to remade it from the scratch.

This was planned as game about surviving in the wilds. You had to find food, build shelter and make tools to make you life in wild Baltic forests and swamps.  I wasn't going to add procedural generation or world digging in minecraft-style, it was meant to be story driven.

WASD for navigation, SPACE for jump, F for fire
